title: Unfree labor systems and agricultural production

content.question: Unfree labor systems were widely used for agricultural production in the period 1450-1750. Analyze the major similarities and differences between TWO of the following systems: Caribbean slavery North American slavery West African slavery Russian serfdom

frqParts.text: Unfree labor systems were widely used for agricultural production in the period 1450-1750. Analyze the major similarities and differences between TWO of the following systems: Caribbean slavery North American slavery West African slavery Russian serfdom

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
